modName: Open Dragon Priest Masks - Requiem Patch
summary: A compatibility patch for requiem that allows you to use Calyps Dragon Priest Masks (with or without Apophysis textures) in your game.
descriptionHtml:
[b][b][color=#d9ead3][size=5]---- I am bad at writing descriptions  ----[/size][/color][/b]
[size=2]
[/size][/b][b][size=2][color=#e06666]If you don't play with the Requiem mod installed you won't need this patch.[/color][/size][/b][b][size=2]
If you came here because you liked the looks of the Mask.  Download it here: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17707/?]Open Dragon Priest Masks[/url] :)   (Remember to endorse Calyps work)
You'll probably want to use [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15052/?]Apophysis Textures as well[/url].  Those 2 mods work great together.   (Cave bears love to munch on people that don't endorse, so remember to give Apophysis all the deserved love as well)

That's... that's pretty much it... I think....
mmmm...  I don't know what else to write in the description. 

Here's a funny picture of[url=http://www.quickmeme.com/img/70/70c4fa190929fdb8862f8b2d2bb7c703c84800cddc86c4818dd2e41fa4c857a0.jpg] a guy Cosplaying as Morokei[/url] I found on google
 
[/size][color=#cfe2f3][size=5]---- How to install  ----[/size][/color][/b]

1) Extract the .esp in your Data folder (Preferably using a Mod Manager program)

2) Activate the .esp

3) Make sure your load order looks something like this:

(...)
calyps-dragonpriestmasks.esp
(...)
Requiem.esp
(...)
calyps-dragonpriestmasks-Requiem.esp
(...)

So remember to force LOOT to load Requiem.esp after calyps-dragonpriestmasks.esp and to load "calyps-dragonpriestmasks-Requiem.esp" after Requiem.esp

4) Run Requiem's Patcher

5) Be happy

[b][size=5][color=#f4cccc]---- How to uninstall ----[/color]
[/size][/b]This mod can be installed and uninstalled at any time, regardless if you have or haven't got a Mask on your character. There's absolutely zero risk in removing it mid-save.... so don't worry. Here's how you remove this mod:

1) Hurt my feelings
2) Delete .esp 
3) Run Requiem's Patcher


----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
